data.title: Drexel University Kline School of Law
data.meta_site_name: Drexel University Kline School of Law
data.text:
Tuition and Fees for the 2024-2025 Academic School Year:

Tuition Fees Annual Flat Rate Per Credit Hour

Law Program Fee/Semester General Fee/Semester

JD Degree (Semester) $55,200

$1,840* (Registered

<9 credits) $480** $420

Masters Programs (Quarter) N/A

$945 N/A $180

*The per credit hour rate does not apply to the Accelerated JD Program and the first semester of the Summer Starter program.

**There is no Law Program Fee for summer semesters, except for students in the Accelerated JD Program.

Admissions Financial Aid Information

86% of our Entering Class of 2022 3-year and 2-year degree students received an academic merit scholarship varying in amount from $10,000 to $50,700.
